# The `SpecialCaseList` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a utility class used to parse user-provided text files with &quot;special case lists&quot; for code sanitizers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SpecialCaseList</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Such files are used to define an &quot;ABI list&quot; for DataFlowSanitizer and allow/exclusion lists for sanitizers like AddressSanitizer or UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer.

Empty lines and lines starting with &quot;#&quot; are ignored. Sections are defined using a &#39;&#91;section&#95;name&#93;&#39; header and can be used to specify sanitizers the entries below it apply to. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/specialcaselist/section">Section</a> names are globs, and entries without a section header match all sections (e.g. an &#39;&#91;&#42;&#93;&#39; header is assumed.) The remaining lines should have the form: prefix:glob&#95;pattern&#91;=category&#93; If category is not specified, it is assumed to be empty string. Definitions of &quot;prefix&quot; and &quot;category&quot; are sanitizer-specific. For example, sanitizer exclusion support prefixes &quot;src&quot;, &quot;mainfile&quot;, &quot;fun&quot; and &quot;global&quot;. &quot;glob&#95;pattern&quot; defines source files, main files, functions or globals which shouldn&#39;t be instrumented. Examples of categories: &quot;functional&quot;: used in DFSan to list functions with pure functional semantics. &quot;init&quot;: used in ASan exclusion list to disable initialization-order bugs detection for certain globals or source files. 

<Link id="details" />


## Full special case list file example:



&#91;address&#93; 



<Link id="details" />



fun:<em>&#95;ZN4base6subtle</em> global:<em>global&#95;with&#95;bad&#95;access&#95;or&#95;initialization</em> global:<em>global&#95;with&#95;initialization&#95;issues</em>=init type:<em>Namespace::ClassName</em>=init src:file&#95;with&#95;tricky&#95;code.cc src:ignore-global-initializers-issues.cc=init mainfile:main&#95;file.cc



&#91;dataflow&#93; 



<Link id="details" />



fun:cos=functional 




## fun:sin=functional

Definition at line 69 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/specialcaselist-h">SpecialCaseList.h</a>.
